system.effect: Trigger - A ranged Water Type Move is used within 10 Meters of the user\nThe Move is turned into a 1-Target Move and is re-directed at the user without fail, and cannot miss. This negates Lock-On or Mind Reader. the userâ€™s Special Attack is then raised by +1 Combat Stage. The user is immune to the damage and effects of Water Type attacks. Defensive.
